name: StoreMemory
description: Store information that can be accessed later by 'RetrieveMemory'.

information.description: The information you want to store. Longer is better

name: RetriveMemory
description: Search for data, via a keyword, that has been 'memorized'. IF you can't find the specific memory, try a range of keywords

keyword.description: The keyword you want to search for

name: PlayMusic
description: Starts or resumes playback of the music on spotify

name: PauseMusic
description: Pauses playback of the music on spotify

Song name.description: The name of the song that should be played

name: GetCurrentSong
description: Get the name of the song that is currently playing
